issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

fixVersions.description: Release 5.1.0-remaining iOS9 features, Android M features

resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description

When building a project for Windows Platform after the build has finished there are  3 orphaned MSBuild processes. 

h5.Steps to reproduce

1. Build a project using {{appc run}} or {{ti build}}
2. Check Task Manager

h5.Actual result

There will be 3 orphaned MSBuild processes

h5.Expected result

There should be no orphaned processes after building
fields.summary: Windows: Orphaned MSBuild processes after building a project
fields.environment:
Windows 8.1
Appc Core: 5.0.2
Appc NPM:4.2.0
Ti SDK: 5.0.1.GA

comments.body:
Verified using:

Windows 10 Pro 
Appc Core: 5.1.0-42 
Appc NPM: 4.2.1 
Ti SDK: 5.1.0.v20151104190037

When building for Windows Platform there are no longer any MSBuild processes left around when the build process has ended

Closing ticket
